CutSceneText.Text: The souls of many Elyos still wander the Salintus Desert.
They were living Guardians when Deltras led his legion into the Abyss.
We killed them all that day, but they fight on as spirits.
Some say they want only to return to Elysea.
They answer now to Deltras' second in command...
...a fierce Guardian warrior they call Lamipedon.
